backend/main.mo: Actor storing click counts in a map with endpoints to record clicks and retrieve counts individually or as an array.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing required updates to videoLessons.ts using user-provided YouTube URLs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files for reference in build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining CSS variables for light and dark themes and applying global background and text settings.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point with PWA meta tags, manifest link, icons, and root element for mounting the app.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, colors, and startup behavior.
frontend/public/offline.html: Offline fallback page with simple branding, retry button, and auto-reconnect logic.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker handling precaching, cache cleanup, fetch interception, and offline fallback routing.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wiring section navigation, search index, service worker registration, and layout composition.
frontend/src/components/BoostlyLink.tsx: Component displaying the site URL with a copy-to-clipboard button and temporary success feedback.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with brand info, resource links, social icons, and a dynamic copyright year.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Displays a hero section with growth messaging, call‑to‑action buttons, and a featured illustration.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Provides a simple page layout wrapper with a full‑height flex column container.
frontend/src/components/MarketingNav.tsx: Implements a responsive marketing navigation bar with search, scroll effects, and mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/components/sections/BroadTo: Renders cards containing broad topic guidance with badges, tips, and optional disclaimers.
frontend/src/components/sections/Content: Displays content type guidance cards including descriptions, tips, and category badges.
frontend/src/components/sections/CoreGro: Renders core growth tips and actionable checklists using cards, pulling data from growthTips and checklists content sources.
frontend/src/components/sections/FaqSect: Displays a FAQ list using an accordion UI fed by the faqs content array.
frontend/src/components/sections/GetBoos: Provides PWA install prompts and post-install callouts, using usePwaInstall for state handling.
frontend/src/components/sections/Payment: Shows Cash App monetization info, tracks click counts, and conditionally displays setup alerts and payment buttons.
frontend/src/components/sections/Platfor: Offers platform-specific growth tips via a tabbed interface populated from platformTips.
frontend/src/components/sections/Subscri: Implements subscription plan selection, feature lists, and tracked outbound subscription links using click counts.
frontend/src/components/sections/ToolsRe: Renders a resources section showing categorized tools with icons, descriptions, and external links. Uses cards and mapped category data to display resource lists.
frontend/src/components/sections/VideoLe: Displays a video lessons section using platform-specific icons and colors, mapping video lesson data into cards with watch buttons or placeholders. Includes helper functions for platform styling and opening video links.
frontend/src/components/SiteSearch.tsx: Provides a searchable input with keyboard navigation, live results, and result selection handling.
frontend/src/config/cashAppLinks.ts: Exports the configured Cash App payment URL. Used for linking users directly to the payment page.
frontend/src/config/paymentContactNote.t: Defines and exports the post-payment contact note configuration with message, contact link, and label. Includes a helper to check if the note is set.
frontend/src/config/subscriptionLinks.ts: Exports subscription payment URLs for monthly and annual plans, both pointing to the Cash App link.
Provides structured guidance items for broad content topics with descriptions, keywords, tips, and optional disclaimers. Covers mental health, learning, and collaboration content.
frontend/src/content/contentTypeGuidance: Defines guidance for various content types with descriptions, keywords, and tips, plus optional disclaimers. Includes categories like personal, wellness, and educational content.
frontend/src/content/growthGuidance.ts: Exports growth tips and checklists outlining social media strategy areas like profile optimization, content planning, engagement, and analytics. Each item includes structured points or checklist items.
frontend/src/content/siteContent.ts: Defines interfaces and static platform tips and FAQs for search indexing and content display.
frontend/src/content/videoLessons.ts: Provides video lesson metadata including IDs, descriptions, platforms, tags, and optional URLs.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, auto‑refreshing queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook for authentication state, login, logout, and identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/usePaymentClickCounts: Tracks and records payment button click counts via backend actor using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/usePwaInstall.ts: Handles PWA install prompt events, exposing installability and installation state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder hook exposing the backend actor for future queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Contains Tailwind CSS setup, color themes, typography, utilities, and UI animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers the service worker on page load with basic logging.
frontend/src/search/scrollAndHighlight.t: Provides smooth scrolling to an element and temporary highlight animation for search results.
frontend/src/search/searchIndex.ts: Builds a unified search index from multiple content sources and provides tokenizing/normalization utilities for querying.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, fonts, container settings, shadows, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, architecture notes, monetization decisions, and existing feature requirements for Boostly.
